name: Digimon Battle Spirit 2
description: Digimon Battle Spirit 2 is a fighting video game for Game Boy Advance developed by Dimps and published by Bandai based on the fourth season of the Digimon anime, Digimon Frontier. It was originally released in Japan for the WonderSwan Color handheld in December 2002 under the title Battle Spirit: Digimon Frontier (バトルスピリット デジモンフロンティア, Batoru Supiritto Dejimon Furontia). The game was later ported to the Game Boy Advance for Western audiences, released in North America in September 2003, and Europe in August 2004.
